name: Compressed Poser Scene File
summary: Learn about .PZZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Uncompressed Poser scene files use the .PZ3 extension.
NOTE: Poser was originally developed by Smith Micro, but was sold to Bondware in June 2019.

description: A PZZ file is a compressed scene file generated using Poser, a software for designing and animating 3D figures. It contains data like 3D figures, props, lighting settings, camera angles, and motion sequences stored within it. Poser is a 3D computer graphics program that allows users to create and animate 3D characters and scenes. Poser typically uses its own file formats to save scenes and content. These file formats can be used to save a variety of information related to a 3D scene, including the 3D models, textures, lighting, camera settings, and animation data.
Compressed scene file created with Poser, a 3D figure design and animation program; includes information such as figures, props, lighting, camera angles, and motion saved in the file.

instructions: You can open PZZ files with Bondware Poser.
